general.headline: HR Assistant at Independent Recruiter
general.description: As recruiters, I believe in working a local area and having face to face contact with the hiring manager is the key to building relationships. When you meet your clients, you see their face, agony and need that they really need to hire that exceptional person that they can't find. Secondly, if we decide to meet every single client, we form a better relationship with the company that has the potential of providing you (the recruiter) more job orders. Recruiters always think the phone should be the extension of your hand as recruiters should be on the phone all day long. I don't disagree with this philosophy but as social media , e-mail and text messaging are getting more prevalent, sometimes e-mailing a client combined with ONE or TWO follow up phone call is the right approach. (Phoning one client too many times or phoning one client five to ten times on a Monday morning) might just ruin that relationship that took 5 to 6 years to build.

jobs.description: Performs a full scope of activities associated with the development and conduct of comprehensive recruiting and employment of new employees. Delivers a pipeline of diverse, quality candidates to recruiters by networking, cold calling, and relationship building within professional organizations and direct sourcing/screening for critical professional and niche positions as determined by the business goals.This Sr. Recruiter will manage the targeted selection process to ensure a rigorous interview process and placement of qualified and motivated candidates. Other responsibilities include ensuring that recruiting practices comply with company policies and procedures, researching and implementing best practices in client groups and contribution to overall T- Mobile HR goals. The Sr. Recruiter may work on high-profile positions or hard-to-fill positions that require sophisticated recruiting techniques. Support clients by understanding business context and needs, providing consulting and implementing talent solutions to meet business goals.

Description: Human Resources Administrative Assistant

Human Resources Administrative Assistant Job Purpose: Supports human resources department by screening and interviewing applicants; preparing payroll; orienting new employees; administering employee benefit programs.
Human Resources Administrative Assistant Job Duties:
Provides job candidates by screening, interviewing, and testing applicants; notifying existing staff of internal opportunities; maintaining personnel records; obtaining temporary staff from agencies.
Pays employees by calculating pay; distributing checks; maintaining records.
Administers student loan, medical insurance, savings bond, and disability programs by advising employees of eligibility; providing application information; helping with form completion; verifying submission; notifying employees of approvals.
Monitors unemployment claims by reviewing claims; substantiating documentation; requesting legal counsel review.
Maintains human resources records by recording new hires, transfers, terminations, changes in job classifications, merit increases; tracking vacation, sick, and personal time.
Orients new employees by providing orientation information packets; reviewing company policies; gathering withholding and other payroll information; explaining and obtaining signatures for benefit programs.
Documents human resources actions by completing forms, reports, logs, and records.
Updates job knowledge by participating in educational opportunities; reading professional publications.
Accomplishes human resources department and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
Skills/Qualifications: Administrative Writing Skills, Verbal Communication, Maintaining Employee Files, Compensation and Wage Structure, Orienting Employees, Benefits Administration, Interviewing Skills, Professionalism, Organization, Teamwork, Supply Management.

•Source high quality prospects against niche, hard-to-find profiles or specific requisitions using sophisticated recruiting techniques such as cold-calling, direct sourcing, competitive research, and networking at professional events, and using other recruiting and sourcing techniques
•Implement proactive sourcing strategies by understanding the trends and gaps in crucial talent pools. Leverage market intelligence to target passive candidates through internet sourcing, resume mining, targeting special interest groups, competitive intelligence, key industries and companies. Leverage professional network to gain industry information on current talent landscape.
•Source, screen, interview and recommend candidates for open positions within professional organizations, including executive level. Direct sourcing/screening for critical professional and niche positions as determined by the business needs while complying with organization policy and government regulatory guidelines.
•Develop proactive traditional and out of the box, national sourcing strategies that build relationships with a diverse pool of candidates and results in quality hires
•Work with executives and managers in functional business areas, presenting best qualified candidates that meet job requirements. Relationship management to include advisement, coaching, influencing and training related to staffing.
•Extensive latitude for independent judgment. Work without supervision on highly complex projects. Assist and coach less experienced peers. Lead internal process and improvement efforts including driving communication and best practice sharing.

People are at the heart of every successful business initiative. At TEKsystems, we understand people. Every year we place over 80,000 IT professionals globally, including thousands of  candidates in permanent roles, at 6,000 client sites across Asia Pacific, Europe and North America.

Our deep insights into human capital management enable us to help our clients achieve their business goals—while optimising their IT workforce strategies.

general.headline: Director - Marketing and Communication, Search and Selection at troocoo
general.description:
I am an experienced, dedicated and passionate recruitment leader with over 12 years’ industry experience supporting the marketing, communications, digital and creative markets here in Brisbane. 

I am a Co-founder and Director of TROOCOO which was established in partnership with several like-minded, experienced and values driven recruitment leaders.

With a genuine desire to support my clients and candidates within the market, through TROOCOO I will continue to offer career guidance and opportunities to candidates, whilst stimulating the employment market through my ongoing network and driving business outcomes. 

Prior to TROOCOO I have led several recruitment teams within the sales, marketing, communications and digital space, working with local and global recruitment firms. Throughout my career, I have had the opportunity to work closely with a diverse range of clients both within the government and private sectors, partnering with clients on senior executive appointments through to temporary contract and project recruitment solutions.

I believe my role is to support and provide clients with strategic advice around acquiring and retaining the best talent in the market, as I believe your people are your best asset in any organisation. This can involve providing counsel around team structure review through to employer branding, communication channels to market, candidate market research and review through to interview panel support. 

Everyone deserves the time to reflect and be supported when considering a career move as it can be both exciting and daunting at the same time. My passion to support people through this, finding clients and candidates fantastic outcomes in a city that I love is what gets me out of bed every day!

jobs.description:
Embedded Search & Selection is a boutique IT & Digital recruitment business with offices in Queensland and NSW. 

We are client and candidate centric and take the time to understand our clients and candidates requirements prior to engaging in any formal agreement or arrangement. We partner with best ICT and Digital talent available today to provide both permanent and contract ICT and Digital solutions to many of Australia's most innovative and respected employers. 

With over 50 years combined IT & Digital recruitment experience, our networks are extensive and current. We are well suited to assist you with the most complex recruitment assignments and have a number of different engagement models to suit the varying needs of our customers.

Brisbane 07 3193 3220 / Gold Coast 07 5646 5555.
www.embeddedsearch.com.au

I started my career in recruitment with Hays in 2002 in the Information Technology Division recruiting in the Executive, Development and Infrastructure areas. After initially managing and growing the IT contract business I was given the opportunity to manage the whole IT recruitment business in 2005.  This business ended up with 21 IT recruiters across 4 geographical regions including Brisbane the Gold Coast, Sunshine Coast and Townsville. At its peak it had over 200 IT contractors in the Queensland marketplace at any one time and would place on average 20 IT professionals into permanent jobs every month. This was a highly successful business in the APAC region and was recognized at national conferences for its outstanding performance and contribution. 

In 2007 I was given the opportunity to oversee the development of the supply chain area consisting of Procurement, Logistics and Manufacturing which also experienced high levels of success, productivity and growth. Then followed the management of the Sales & Marketing business unit.  In 2009 my responsibility grew with taking on supervision of the Gold Coast division of Hays consisting of Senior Finance, Sales & Marketing, IT, Office Support, Construction, Engineering and Labor hire. This was on the back of the GFC where the Gold Coast certainly felt the brunt of that economic pain compared to most Queensland business centre’s. That being said the office remained a consistent performer in the Hays portfolio. 

I have managed combined teams of up to 40 employees in total across different geographical locations and industries throughout Queensland whilst being involved in the development of new and existing employee’s from Associate level right through to Senior management. I attended National and Global operations meetings participating in strategy and performance improvement discussions to achieve company wide objectives.

jobs.description:

It starts with conversation and learning about our clients and candidates long before a job opening exists. This allows us to gain greater insight into the quality of the candidate’s potential fit with our clients.

general.description:
I am an experienced Consultant specialising within the IT and Digital market in Brisbane. I get excited by being able to build strong relationships with clients and candidates and help make introductions for long term success for both parties. The core focus is on understanding the needs of clients and candidates to and find the perfect fit. Taking the time to work with clients and understand their drivers and motivations, cultural fit and career ambitions and working with them through their career to be available for questions and advice.

I enjoy learning all about new technologies, start-ups and anything else out of the ordinary along with a very keen interest in AFL. If you think that there may be some opportunities to work together then certainly get in touch and it would be great to arrange to catch up. My focus is on delivering value through the recruitment process and helping clients with speed to market and giving back time for other business activity. 

I work with clients from initial start-up to ASX-100 listed and can customise a solution that fits the needs of the business and future growth. Roles that I have recruited for within IT and Digital includes Infrastructure, Software Development, Cloud, Web and Digital/Design, UX/UI Specialists, Business Analysts, Engineers, Architects, SAP Specialists, Project & Program Managers, IT Managers, Chief Information Officer and Chief Technical Officer.

Looking to leverage my years in the industry and continue building new client relationships. If you want to explore working together and what we can offer than certainly get in touch. A no-nonsense approach with great delivery!. Please feel free to contact me on 0401 857 184 or email andrewm@finite.com.au

jobs.description:
Finite have built a successful recruitment business with a focus on delivering the right people for the right job. Started in 1999 the team has always focused on quality and relationships to deliver outcomes for both clients and candidates.

With Finite, you are dealing with people who know what you want and able to work with you in finding the best solution. Having the right help when it comes to recruitment can take a huge weight off your shoulders and that is where we can come in. The team work collaboratively to ensure speed to market and their national footprint ensures a great depth of available talent.

Finite invests in leading edge infrastructure, applications, systems and workplaces to support the successful outcomes required from our clients and candidates and the brand is trusted across Australia to deliver on our promises.

During my time at PRA I worked with a range of IT and Digital clients and candidates with a full service recruitment solution. Building strong relationships and using a customised approach to help clients build great teams with top talent. 

I was responsible for building a strong pipeline of work across the IT and Digital space from both a contract and permanent perspective. The types of roles which I worked on included Software Development (.NET, C#, ASP.NET, SQL, Sharepoint, WPF, WCF, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, Bootstrap, AngularJS, ReactJS, Flux, Knockout, NodeJS), Digital Marketing, UI/UX Developers/Designers, Infrastructure (System & Network Administrators, Helpdesk & IT Support, Trainers), BI/DW, CIO/CTO and Enterprise Application/Architects.

With Hays I was responsible for recruiting Experts within the Brisbane IT industry and focused on Software Development. Working to deliver great results and understand clients needs to get the best outcomes.

My role included everything from Business Development to Candidate Management and being able to work on Candidate Attraction strategies to ensure we could obtain market leading outcomes. This role helped to develop a strong network with some of the very best talent in the market and being able to keep regular contact and understand the candidates career ambitions and being able to build these relationships long into the future.

I was responsible for building new relationships across the CBD and Northern Suburbs regions. This role was focused on new business and driving Canon Business product sales in both hardware and software. This B2B role included cold calling, Door knocking, Client Events and seminars along with a number of other initiatives to build the brand presence and drive business.

general.headline: Principal Consultant at Terry Group Consulting
general.description:
I help businesses to achieve their goals with a growth approach from sales and marketing through commercial, operational excellence and strategy development. I have worked with companies to increase revenues, lower costs and deliver outstanding service to their clients. The development and execution of strategies and subsequent growth. I have worked with business to grow, raise capital, and develop exit strategies.
 

With a deep understanding of enterprise software across Financials, BPM, Asset Management, Facilities Management, Building Information Management, Spatial, Mapping, Mobility and Data. I have research teams that have extensive market knowledge of vendors and capabilities and combined with our “future state” view of the markets I operate in, I provide immense value to our clients
My experience is deep, our thought leadership with respect to new and emerging technologies is immense. Our ability to stay on the cutting edge is one of the key differentiators. I stay close to emerging trends and technologies and how they may affect your business and how to position to capitalise on that.

I’ve transformed financially distressed software businesses, I’ve grown financially strong business to be even stronger. I’ve delivered on pipeline development, I’ve developed professional commercial frameworks, I help reorganise, I’ve worked on mergers and acquisitions and capital raising for past clients. I bring a fresh and creative view to each engagement combined with a solid track record of success.
 
My track record is deep and stands across number of brand name companies that are well recognised in the industry.
My consulting practice focuses on assessing your business understanding where you are, understanding where you want to be, and the requirements to get you there.
I employ a number of world-renowned methodologies, as well as some of our own to assess, process, develop and then execute a plan to your business to deliver dynamic growth

jobs.description:
At TGC, we consist solely of highly skilled and experienced practitioners who engage stakeholders across business that requires a disciplined approach to sales growth, management and execution

Our clients use us to organise Sales, Marketing and disciplines and drive execution and predictable revenues

With an immaculate track record, TGC develops and drives significant business growth. Our passion and focus is to guide and support businesses focusing on technology.  Our business to business approach balances being “hands on”, working with direct sales reports, to being a personal guide for your business team. Well versed in important key sales methodologies we are direct when needed and innovative with our business approach.

By putting your faith in our B2B services you will embark on a dynamic journey of change. TGC adopts impressive methodologies to nurture your imagined business plan. Your business will have direction, solid goals and reach your vision horizon.

My role as GM for the region is to promote business through thought leadership engagement with senior executives. I maintain and develop relationships talking to business outcomes, not software solutions. My role is to see that our clients are clear that we understand their business, the challenges they face and how we can assist them to gain efficiencies and greater outcomes through the enablement layer of technology. It's not about features and functions, it's about having a clear understanding of our clients challenges, what we offer and how we best marry the two, to help them achieve their goals.

general.description:
What we do ▬▬▬▬▬▬ We coach individuals and businesses on an intensive executive mind coaching programme that has been put together as a result of 55 years of in-depth study on the human thought. This program addresses your mindset so you can finally work towards your potential. We deliver results that stick. You are the programmer we will show you how to re-write the programme. Period.

► Why this program gets you results that stick.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
The truth is, most people do not know the cause of their results and the cause of their results is the Paradigm. We have all had those experiences where we go and learn something new only to find ourselves weeks down the track defaulting too our old habits and behaviours. 

✔️Frustrated with your Results in life or business? 
✔️Same results year in year out?
✔️Realising your business culture is not working?
✔️High staff turn over?
✔️Self- Sabotage?
✔️Procrastination issues?
✔️Sick of watching others get the results you want?
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
►How do we assist you in transforming your mindset:
We work 1:1 or group interaction that has the option to be engaged in a 12 or 24-week life-changing transformational programme. 55year's of study on what drives behaviour. Most people try to change behaviour only, and that is why all your previously New Year's resolutions never worked you need to understand what drives the action to initiate change that sticks.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
► The journey:
This incredible discovery will empower you to begin taking control. Understanding "HOW" you are programmed, and how to remove these harmful programmes that don't serve you and making them obsolete. Then replacing them with ones that empower you is one of life's most liberating experiences you will need a telescope to see how far you have come in six short months.
Mobile:0477723079
Email:Intoresults@gmail.com

jobs.description:
Proctor Gallagher Mind Institute ►Mind Coach►Belief Systems ►Self-Image ► Self Sabotage ►Procrastination► Team culture►Personel development

►What we do▬▬▬▬▬▬ We coach individuals and businesses on an intensive executive training mind coaching programme that has been put together as a result of 55 years of in-depth study on what drives human behaviour.
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
"Education does not mean teaching people what they do not know; it means teaching them to behave as they do not behave." 
- John Ruskin
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
► The Training
Join us for a ‘No Pitch’ Private Mind coaching consultation and discover how you can set up your future and remove your limiting beliefs and start working with your potential today.

► How our results are created. 
▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
The truth is, most people do not know the cause of their results and the cause of their results is the Paradigm. We have all had those experiences where we go and learn something new only to find ourselves weeks down the track defaulting too our old habits and behaviours. 

The problem is, most training is based on getting people to know more, but knowing more does not equal better results. We need to close the gap between what we know and what we do. However, how do we do that? We need to create a paradigm shift.

One of the reasons why this coaching program is so extraordinarily effective is because it is a systematic process to facilitate change and a Quantum Leap in peak performance. It creates a quick and permanent paradigm shift for individuals and teams because it targets the subconscious mind – where our habits, our beliefs, our self-image and ultimately our results are created.

Finite recruits permanent, executive and contract IT professionals (local and international). We find the right people for the right IT job at the right time. 

We have been successfully doing this since 1999 and our team of committed consultants is adept at filling mainstream IT roles, as well as more specialist, niche or hard-to-source roles that others may struggle with. In fact, we thrive on the challenge.

With Finite, you are dealing with people who know what you want, know how to get it to you and do it quickly. That can make an enormous difference when your company is under-resourced or expanding fast. It can take a real load off your shoulders.

Finite invests in leading edge infrastructure, applications, systems and workplaces to offer our team the very best environment and support tools to carry out their tasks. 

Our brand is known and trusted by IT candidates across Australia. These talented people know we offer them real career opportunities with prestigious blue-chip employers. general.headline: Digital, Marketing And Creative Recruiter | Pro-Working Mama Advocate | Changing Digital Marketers Lives Since 2011
general.description:
Hi There! 

My name is Eron. 
I'm a recruiter, and I'm actually damn proud about it. 

To tell you a little more about me, I started my career initially in 2010 as a Digital Marketer in a local Brisbane digital agency running PPC campaigns for a sizeable portfolio of SME’s. After a year of doing that, I then completely pivoted into a Human Resources Manager role at that very same agency, and I’m proud to say I played a big part in enabling the business to scale before it internationalized. 

After being in a digital environment for over five years recruiting for all sorts of cool roles internally, I decided that I should try my hand at agency recruitment, which is an unlikely career trajectory, I know. Fortunately for me, I discovered that I loved it and by absolute luck, I've landed my dream role as a member of the affix crew, where I'm one of the foundation members of the Brisbane office! 

At affix, we hang out in the Digital and Technology space where our purpose is to help businesses of all shapes and sizes scale their teams by finding them wonderful humans and offer them a genuine recruitment alternative. What's my role in all of this? I play an important part in helping people find their happy place at work. That's right, I get to change lives for a living 🌎⭐️🙌🏽

Outside of affix, I'm a proud mama and a wife. I love great food, a good Pinot, a sneaky G&T, 90's hip-hop, travel, and I adore having real conversations with real people. 

I'm super approachable and everyone who knows me will testify that I love a good chat. If you’d like to get to know me more or if you think there’s a way we could help one and other, then let’s talk.

Laurence Baynham, Chief Executive Officer, B.Bus, FAICD

Appointed Chief Executive Officer in November 2014 and Managing Director in November 2016, Laurence Baynham is responsible for the day-to-day operational and planning activities for the Data#3 Group. Prior to these roles, Laurence held the position of Data#3 Group General Manager for 10 years, and was responsible for profit and customer satisfaction across the company’s lines of business and geographies. Laurence joined Data#3 in 1994, bringing with him a broad range of international IT industry experience. Laurence holds a Bachelor of Business (with Honours) from East London University, is a graduate of the INSEAD Business School (Singapore) Strategic Management Academy and a Fellow of the Australian Institute of Company Directors. Laurence sits on a number of global advisory boards for key strategic partners, representing Data#3 and the wider Australian channel community. In September 2016, Laurence was inducted into the Australian ICT Industry Hall of Fame.

general.headline: Director & Co-Founder
general.description:
I've worked in the technology domain for almost 30 years across delivery, technology management, product management and sales.  This led to establishing the 4impact business in 2005 to build an organisation with strong values and based upon a belief that people are the key to success in all industries including IT.

4impact now serves customers across the eastern seaboard of Australia and in to New Zealand.  We employ people in three countries and give back to the region through key social enterprises like Opportunity International.  We are proud to have grown out of the Queensland market and want to continue to grow to serve the Pacific region, our people and our community.

jobs.description:

- Consulting Services

We have been delivering agile solutions based on automated approaches since well before it became trendy.  We have a strong partnerships and technology delivery pedigree with outstanding skills in areas like:

- Guidewire

4impact provides a refreshingly open and transparent approach to doing business. Its dedication to positive client outcomes has been well received and it has grown into an award-winning company across Australia and New Zealand with operations in those locations as well as The Philippines.

general.headline: Program, Project and Service Delivery Professional
general.school: Defence College of Communications information Systems
general.description:
I am an experienced and qualified Program and Project Management professional with over 18 years’ experience managing large-scale technology implementations.  Critical to my success is my approach to ensuring change and transformation issues support the strategic objectives for each organisation.

Major Achievements

Lead a global team (Australia, India, Manila) to successfully delivery multiple transformation projects as part of the UnitingCare Queensland (UCQ) Transform Program.  The UCQ program was established to support the restructuring and optimisation of the UCQ group. The introduction of NDIS, increased market space competition and resources in the health and aged care was a driving factor for all departments to become more commercially competitive. The program identified an opportunity to analyse, source, select and transition to a new Service Delivery approach for UCQ’s ICT services.  The key objective was to transition and outsource a highly complex and fragmented landscape to an end to end managed service ICT delivery model.

Program delivery of CGI's Collections360® solution, including Data Enrichment, Mail in and Mail out service which provided the State Penalties Enforcement Registry with a single integrated system that enabled an increase in collections and a reduction in the age of debts, using analytics to drive automation and enhance productivity. The contract was valued at AU$58.8 million covering five years of service and an optional two-year extension. Lead global team of 20 between Australia, India and USA across 5 streams of work.

Managed business transformation through implementation of virtualisation technology, regionalisation, rationalisation and outsourcing of ICT services across numerous UK tail sites including a desktop refresh, services migration, reallocation of man power and an upgrade program which reduced the total cost of ownership of infrastructure and consolidation of manpower.

jobs.description: Project Delivery of the CGI Collections360® solution and associated services; which will provide the State Penalties Enforcement Registry with a single integrated system that will enable an increase in collections and a reduction in the age of debts, using analytics to drive automation and enhance productivity. The contract is valued at AU$58.8 million (CAD$57.6 million) which covers five years of service.

Leading and Management of the ICT Operations Group day to day activities. Whilst developing strategies, provision of expertise and high level advice, the development of, review and implementation of policy, procedures and standards ensuring that the ICT infrastructure and application services are provided in an effective and efficient manner to support the business operation of Allconnex Water

SERCO an International Services company providing essential services as a Principal Engineer.  Working within the IT and Communication Division, successfully managing projects, integration and acceptance of various high profile deliveries and services.

Perform program planning, management and engineering responsibilities for various systems from inception, integration, through system life cycle to succession and removal.
Principal Engineer responsible for the management of change to the technical baseline.

NCSA CIS Stavanger Squadron Norway. Providing various Information Technology and
      
      Communications Systems and services to the NATO Joint Warfare Centre.

jobs.jobTitle: Lead Recruiter - Technology, Leadership, Consulting and Sales
jobs.description:
Cognizant is one of the world's leading professional services companies, transforming clients' business, operating and technology models for the digital era. Our unique industry-based, consultative approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses. Headquartered in the U.S., Cognizant, a member of the NASDAQ-100, is ranked 230 on the Fortune 500 and is consistently listed among the most admired companies in the world.

I am the Lead Recruiter for Technical and Business Leadership, Consulting and Sales hiring for Australia and NZ. I manage the recruitment strategy for roles within Digital and Analytics streams, Cloud and Infrastructure Services, Enterprise Application and Integration Platform Systems, Business Process Services,  Big Data. Additionally, I manage the hiring for all regional leadership and sales positions.  

Acting as a Recruitment Business Partner,  I work very closely with Hiring Managers, HR and Staffing team to create and implement candidate attraction and recruitment strategies that align with urgency, Cognizant’s global delivery models while creating brand awareness and providing excellent candidate and hiring manager experience. I manage a recruiter in Australia and  work with remote teams in China, Singapore and Middle East for sourcing purposes. I am responsible for driving diversity and inclusion programs and initiatives across Australia.

I am measured in my role on the speed and quality of resourcing delivery, agency use,  sourcing channel  mix, diversity and inclusion, hiring manager experience and candidate experience.

CGI is the 5th largest independent IT consulting and BPS company in the world. Employing over 72,000 people globally, we deliver from over 125 locations. In my role I am responsible for strategic talent acquisition and managing the full life cycle recruitment process for all roles including IT Consulting, Infrastructure and Managed Services, Application Development, Corporate Services and Project Management -  for the Australia Business Unit. A key aspect of my role is developing Social media and branding strategies for optimization and efficiency of recruitment function. I am also responsible for reporting on recruitment activity for all engagements and projects across Australia. I enjoy working on development of refined and documented recruitment processes, coaching Hiring Managers and looking after integrity of recruitment systems.

I was brought on board on a 12 month contract to build up Huawei's national delivery team for VHA RAN and Optus. An extremely large, critical, fast moving project, I was responsible for hiring over 400 contractors over 12 month and resulting in savings of over $1 million for Huawei. During the teething phases for these projects, I also acted  a point of contact for technical services areas, OH&S teams, Finance, quality and other internal departments for ensuring smooth delivery of project's resourcing needs.I thoroughly enjoyed working closely with the hiring managers and being a part of the first of its kind network upgrade project for Vodafone Australia.

As a 360 degree consultant and client account manager on the C100 team, I was responsible for recruitment of IT resources for various government departments. I was responsible for advertising jobs, screening and shortlisting, interviewing and working with clients to identify needs and right fits for the positions. As an Account Manager, I met all my clients and contractors on regular basis and identified any potential new opportunities for Talent International's services and opportunities for us to improve our services and delivery standards. I met all our quarterly targets and exceeded many times.

general.headline: Enterprise Agility Servant
general.description:
A passionate and energetic servant leader who is a big picture thinker with over 20 years of experience in  harnessing skills that bring out the best in teams she leads.  "It's very important to me to really connect with people.  I need them to feel that I am supporting them to develop their skills and that they feel rewarded for what they do".  As a proactive advocate of change, Brigitte has become known for making significant changes to team structure and process in order to reduce cost and improve productivity. 

With a strong IT focus Brigitte has had success at implementing new technology platforms and large decommissioning initiatives focusing on two project management specialty areas: Agile project management and troubled projects using techniques from Scrum, Extreme Programming, Feature-Driven Development, and other Agile methods. She is certified by the Scrum Alliance as  a Certified ScrumMaster (CSM), has multiple ICAgile Certifications including Agile Coaching Professional and is a PMI-certified Project Management Professional (PMP).  Prior to Project Management, Brigitte was the Webmaster at a financial institute, using her skills as a qualified web and graphic designer where she constructed the organisations intranet and internet sites.

Before finding her passion developing teams, Brigitte sailed the seas as a ships photographer.  She dived many oceans as a dive master and jumped out of planes just for fun. A natural all round adventurer, Brigitte has travelled many roads during her career.  She studied at Varsity College School of Business & Technology before leaving her home country of South Africa to take on the world, have children and build a family.

Brigitte’s enthusiasm is contagious, and her style very lively and no-nonsense. She speaks with great credibility, especially as she backs what she says with colourful descriptions of her own rich project and life experience

general.headline: Principal Consultant at ASG Group
general.description:
Ben brings 20+ years of consulting experience in digital transformation, strategy, advisory, program / project delivery and account management. He has worked with a broad range of clients, helping them to achieve their growth potential, improve business performance, reduce operational costs and overcome compliance issues.

Ben’s core capabilities include:
- Strategy-led design and execution
- Digital transformation, design and delivery
- Program / project planning and delivery
- Business advisory and improvement

Key to Ben's success has been his business acumen and his ability to bring a strategic focus to complex transformational programs. He has a track record of success in building relationships and facilitating outcomes across a diverse range of stakeholders.  He is results-focused and brings a respectful and collaborative communication style.

jobs.description:
The ASG Group acquired SMS Management and Technology in September 2017.

Ben is a Principal Consultant and has worked across a range of industries on complex business and technology consulting engagements (see examples listed under SMS below).

Recently, Ben was an Account Director where he was responsible for the management of strategic client accounts and contributed to the strategic growth and development of the Queensland practice.

As a Principal Consultant, Ben has worked across a broad range of engagements. Some examples include:

Commission - Digital Program delivery and capability development (2 years). Responsible for delivering the first phase of a Digital Channel shift program. Ben also delivered a new Insurance capability using innovative design (UX) and Agile delivery techniques. 

Insurance - Program Manager responsible for a diverse portfolio delivering new products online and streamlining back-office functions. Worked with executive and multi-disciplinary teams across all aspects of program planning, delivery, financial and resource management using Agile and Prince2 delivery methods. 

Mining and resources - Program Initiation and Planning. Responsibilities included the development of a unified technology program to support a leaner business operating model. 

Financial Services - Led a multi-disciplinary team to identify and remediate customers that were materially impacted by systemic issues within the organisation. 

Ports - Providing QA oversight across the development of a 5-year IT strategy and roadmap to support a significant IT transformation program.

Queensland Practice Lead - Overseeing and/or delivering complex programs focused on improving profitability, efficiency compliance and collaboration. Some examples include:

Credit Union – Worked with the Board to develop a 5-year strategy, which included assessing several models to transform the business around new digital channels. 

Local Government - Developed a 5-year Enterprise Content Management Strategy that would form the basis of the Council's vision to improve collaboration and streamline its service delivery capability. 

Government Agency - Completed a national Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery review. 

Peak Body- Completed a comprehensive review of the industry's supply chain to identify the risks and impact of future Government reforms associated with Personal Properties Securities. 

Credit Union - Completed a feasibility assessment of potential lending solutions that would integrate with a new banking solution.

general.headline: Account Executive / Board Member
general.description:
An independent thinker with an eye for detail, I have over 20 years global experience in strategically developing and driving innovative growth strategies in business, leading to wealth creation for shareholders.

My niche business experience across many disciplines including accounting, financial services, information technology, new business development, senior client relationship management, marketing and people development allows me to connect at every level of an organisation. Applying fresh thinking I can quickly understand and question the unique attributes of a business, and design, build and drive profitable change.

My passion for learning and inspiring people drives me. I consider all new challenges as incentives for growth, both personally and professionally.

jobs.description: A Not for Profit Community based business in South East Queensland with over 400 staff, that provides health and community services to over 1000 clients in the areas of Home Based Aged Care, Disability Services, Childcare, Cultural (including Paniyiri Festival), Education, Sports Centre, and Youth Initiatives.
Partnering with companies to find innovative business solutions using technology

ECCQ has been established for 40 years as the peak body in Queensland for ethnic communities and cultural diversity. ECCQ acts as a strategic mechanism for the empowerment of people from diverse ethnic and cultural backgrounds through policy research and development, sector collaboration and community education and training around leadership and better health outcomes

The Proactive Accountants Network is the leading global network of the most proactive accountants. Established in Australia in 2005, Our proprietary offering of content, coaching and technology is offered through our worldwide membership program.

I am responsible for translating all the entrepreneurial ideas of the business into plans and actions that drive success, and create wealth.

Leading and building a high performing team, to support the sales and corporate strategy of the business. Managing a team of 13 across 3 business functions, business consulting, training and information technology, I was responsible for the review, design and implementing the strategy of the new team, embedding best practice account management processes to improve client relationships with the view to increasing revenue, margin and market share.

Responsible for building the London business of a newly established national company within the emerging industry sector of wrap platforms in the UK. I took this role shortly after relocating to London, and with no existing networks, or specific knowledge of the UK financial services sector, I was able to quickly build the territory, making it the largest part of the business, and the leading competitor to larger national institutional businesses. Working alongside the executive team, I was able to provide thought leadership on propositional developments, and best practice business processes. Managing key relationships and driving activity through the recruitment of financial planners, and discretionary managers, and the delivery of client activities and business planning programs.

Genesys Wealth Advisers (GWA) and the Bank of Queensland (BOQ) entered into a strategic alliance to provide wealth management solutions to BOQ Bank customers using GWA’s technology platform. I was responsible for the national management and implementation of the strategy supporting the alliance, driving revenue and managing the performance of financial results. Cross border relationship management of key stakeholders in both organizations, and overseeing the marketing, and education initiatives, and mentoring and matching program designed to drive activity and results.

Working with major energy partners I designed, marketed and sold an innovative solution to training their leadership teams. I also participated in the program alongside the executive team of a leading provider.

Godfrey Pembroke is a boutique dealer group and subsidiary of the National Australia Bank. As Regional Manager I was responsible for management of Queensland and Northern Territory, developing new and existing business opportunities, driving revenue through planner business activity managing compliance, training and quality accreditation. implementing business planning programs , as well as developing strategic alliances. I was awarded the national No1 ranking for increased performance for the 2003 year.

general.headline: Enterprise Architect at First Data Corporation
general.description:
Over 20 years experience in the design, development and delivery of e-Commerce and payment system solutions. 

An EFT payments specialist with extensive consulting experience.

Specialist expertise in  

•	EFTPOS, ATM, payment systems, transaction switching, transaction processing and card related solutions and services 
•	Key Management and Cryptographic Functions at device, host, and interchange level including working knowledge of EMV crypto functions.
•	Credit Card Scheme Rules and regulations as well as APCA, CECS and Payment Card Industry (PCI) Data Security Standard compliance.
•	Extensive experience with EMV (Acquiring and Issuing), contact and contactless chip cards as well as smart card loyalty applications. 
•	Digital wallets and Tokenisation

jobs.description:
Duties include -
•	Pre-sales analysis and high level costing for new sales proposals. 
•	Requirement gathering, gap analysis, business process identification, analysis and re-design, production of functional specifications, review and sign off on test strategies and supporting test processes, implementation planning, post implementation support and project closure with handover to production support areas.
•	Consulting on behalf of First Data to key clients

Tech Lead for ATM/ switch Channel.

Summary of projects

•	Supported a Core System Migration with EDS/ BOQ in 2004 where the Banks entire ATM fleet, PIN solution Branch network and host system was upgraded from a Fujitsu mainframe to an IBM i-series platform running FISERV and Euronet applications. Implementation was a ‘big bang’ approach.
•	Performed a seamless Card Data migration of a smaller regional institutions Card base and Cardholder PIN base onto the Banks Host system platform.
•	Implemented numerous new Card Credit and Debit card products and new BIN’s. Performed PIV verification of numerous system upgrades and implementations.
•	Developed and implemented a Debit Card ‘Stand in Processing’ solution. This significantly reduced the Banks exposure to Fraud by enabling ‘On-line’ verification of Cardholder PIN’s during Host system outages, thus reducing the Host system downtime during Host system upgrades and during both unscheduled and scheduled outages.
•	Worked under direct instruction from the Account executive to develop a Roadmap for the Banks future ATM acquiring and transaction switching strategy. Roadmap incorporated revenue generation around switching and interchange fees as well as Technical solution options around consolidation of ATM device drivers and switching of Transactions to OFI’s.
•	Tech Lead for the solution stream component of a project involving migration of the Banks credit card processor from Cardpac on a HDS mainframe to a Vision Plus system with CITIBANK. Developed a TCP interchange link for transaction processing between Brisbane and Singapore.

Halcyon Knights is an IT&T Executive Search and Recruitment firm, operating in Australia, New Zealand and Singapore. Halcyon Knights commenced trading in March 2007 in Melbourne, Australia, and has now established 5 offices throughout Asia-Pacific, in Melbourne, Sydney, Canberra, Auckland and Singapore.

Our breadth of service spans the Information Technology sector, in both vertical and horizontal markets, broadly categorised as Digital recruitment, Vendor recruitment or Cloud, Infrastructure & Project Services (CIPS) recruitment. Working with clients and candidates throughout the APAC region, we are in fact Australia's largest dedicated technology vendor recruitment practice. Our team have a depth of knowledge and understanding in their areas of specialist recruitment markets and have a vast network of candidates who are actively seeking new opportunities, or who are open to being approached for career opportunities in their space.

In 2016 we were awarded as LinkedIn's 'Most Socially Engaged Enterprise Staffing Agency' in Australia, offering our clients and candidates greater reach and exposure within the Asia Pacific region and beyond.

Our resource model offers solutions that can flex according to your project needs and the ICT environment which are dynamic and ever-changing. Insite currently works with many leading organisations in Banking, Telecommunications, Logistics, Utilities and Health and Human Services Corporations.

general.headline: IT & Digital Recruitment Consultant
general.description:
My professional goal is straight forward and simple - to provide my clients with a solution to a problem or pain point they might be experiencing within their IT Department through the recruitment of high quality IT & Digital professionals! 
My ongoing commitment to my clients includes:

-  Listening: I will always work harder than my competitors in understanding the positions you are hiring for. You know your business best; I will listen and learn in order to establish what characteristics/skills will result in providing you with the best technical and cultural fit possible.

-   Quality: This is a conscious choice we all make within our work, never an accident! I connect organisations with high quality IT & Digital personnel through quality processes backed by a brand that is/has always been, heavily associated with quality.

-   Honesty: I will tell you what I can reasonably deliver and then ensure I do it.

-  Knowledge: I continually invest in my own industry knowledge and personal development.

-  Focus: I will always work on getting the basics 100% right rather than pursuing the latest ‘craze’ within my industry. High quality recruitment is all about people and connections.

- Long Term Partnership: I consciously maintain focussed on establishing and facilitating strong long term business relationships. I get to know your business thoroughly and am invested in helping you reach your organisational goals.

If you would like to discuss what we are currently seeing within the Brisbane IT market or if you have any staffing needs for high performing ICT personnel, please do not hesitate to get in contact. I would be happy to help find the right resource for you and your respective business. I can be contacted directly on 0428 903 902or emailed at daniel@exclaim-it.com.au. I look forward to working with you!

My key strengths lie in my ability to quickly bond with a team & create the vision & focus to successfully deliver on time, within budget, scope and more importantly to the expectations of all stakeholders.

I enjoy challenging projects & will always rise to the challenge.  I relish the opportunity to work with geographically, culturally & linguistically dispersed teams. I find  differing perspectives from these types of teams enrich the end solution.

I believe the above is what sets me apart from all other project managers.

My primary role in this program of work was to provide dedicated project management as a Project Manager for three of the projects within the FIP i.e. Consolidated Data Storage Services Solution and Consolidated Data Protection Services Solution and the Server and VMware Infrastructure projects. The FIP was a 30 million dollar Program of works.
One of the major components of the FIP involves the integration of not only the individual projects but the overall integration of testing facilities, management processes and product and service delivery capabilities. general.headline: Business Development Manager, Technology and Executive Search (11000+ connections) at Finite IT Recruitment Solutions
general.description:
I am a Senior Talent Acquisition/Recruitment professional with 13+ years experience in attracting, retaining and developing human capital resources. Combined in-house and agency recruitment experience for leading organisations. Experienced across diverse sectors (Banking & Financial Services, Energy, Oil & Gas, Utilities, IT). I have the ability to engage at all levels of management with a results-orientated and problem solving approach. International background with a successful multicultural experience in Australia. I am passionate about business outcomes, performance, talent management & service excellence
 
My aim is to bring to recruitment the passion, drive and innovation that motivates all successful people to strive for the next step. I pride myself on being able to understand not only a professional's best place within the culture of a business but to have the ability to apply this as the basis of a realistic and satisfying recruiting solution.

Specialties: My main specialties / skills are:

Recruitment through Social Media
Cold Calling / New business development
Identification / Selection of 'good' business
Client management / Relationship development
Negotiation - at all levels
Delivering and understanding client needs
Time management and effective prioritization
Management of a team

My language skills: fluent English, Dutch, French.

jobs.jobTitle: Business Development Manager, Technology and Executive Search (11000+ connections)
jobs.description:
Finite recruits permanent, executive and contract IT professionals (local and international). We find the right people for the right IT job at the right time. 

We have been successfully doing this since 1999 and our team of committed consultants is adept at filling mainstream IT roles, as well as more specialist, niche or hard-to-source roles that others may struggle with. In fact, we thrive on the challenge.

With Finite, you are dealing with people who know what you want, know how to get it to you and do it quickly. That can make an enormous difference when your company is under-resourced or expanding fast. It can take a real load off your shoulders.

Finite invests in leading edge infrastructure, applications, systems and workplaces to offer our team the very best environment and support tools to carry out their tasks. 

Our brand is known and trusted by IT candidates across Australia. These talented people know we offer them real career opportunities with prestigious blue-chip employers. Candidates benefit by knowing the jobs are some of the best opportunities available and employers benefit through a diverse base of quality people open and responsive to available roles.

jobs.jobTitle: Queensland State Manager - Technology and Executive Search (9700+ connections)
jobs.description:
Just six years after inception, Path4 was recognised as the fastest growing recruitment firm and the ninth fastest business for growth in Australia. Four years on, Path4 has maintained this recognition year on year and is now considered an industry leader.

Path4 is a unique composition of a national network of experienced owner recruiters who each own their own business. This means that not only will you experience the significant benefits of dealing directly with the business owner but you will also enjoy the confidence of knowing that they in turn, are supported by a national footprint, enterprise level technologies, systems and processes.

Because every client is unique, our solutions often vary by client yet the results never do. Regardless of whether we are providing individual recruitment support services or a fully outsourced recruitment process, we offer the best possible candidates with our personal guarantee: When we partner, you will be referred the right candidate. 

My responsibilities include:

All strategic, operational and financial activities
Building and maintaining successful and profitable relationships with clients by fully understanding their business requirements and continuously improving our services.
Preparation of forecasts and budgets in support of business objectives
Developing team members through coaching, mentoring, on the job learning, training, performance management and development activities.

Talent International is a progressive and highly innovative global IT & T Recruitment and Technology Services specialist supplying thousands of contract and permanent technology professionals across all aspects of the IT, Telco, and Digital sectors. 
With 14 offices throughout Australia, New Zealand SE Asia, NE Asia, and the UK and revenue exceeding A$300 million per annum the company is currently experiencing outstanding growth and recognition as it aims to build the most comprehensive delivery model across APAC and Europe supported by a range of unique initiatives.

In addition Talent International operates Agile Logic, a highly successful and complementary IT Consulting business.

The next five years are set to be tremendously exciting as we look to roll out a global brand that will include a number of unique initiatives. This includes the “Talent Unleashed Awards” which recognises and rewards great technology talent and ideas in Australia and New Zealand, the UK and Asia. This year we're delighted to have Steve Wozniak joining Sir Richard Branson on the judging panel along with a number of other inspirational business leaders. 

We are also very pleased to announce that our foundation "Talent Rise" has stepped up this year with the launch of a program to address unacceptably high rates of youth unemployment through an ambitious program of technology education, mentoring and work placements.

Other game changing developments are currently underway related to how we will take customer service to new levels through a new and entrepreneurial approach to engagement and loyalty.

So it's pleasing to see that as we look to build a global business with some great ideas and value propositions, we continue to attract great people and business partners who believe in our vision.

Greythorn have been providing recruitment solutions since 1976 into the IT & Telecom markets. We are well versed in the technology issues facing the industry today; be it balancing the cost of development to achieving business objectives through outsourcing. Greythorn has built a reputation based upon authoritative, friendly personal service.

With experience in corporate and agency environment I have recruited a vast number of roles from junior to senior executive positions and work to understand the needs of my clients to ensure high caliber candidates combined with an efficient and ethical recruitment processes. 

I understand market trends and keep up to date with market knowledge in my focus areas, have business acumen and have an ability to develop strategic recruitment solutions.

I am a team player and am passionate about developing professional relationships with both clients and candidates who I work with. I pride myself on my outgoing and positive attitude and am able to work well under pressure to achieve desired results. 

My main focus is delivering high quality recruitment solutions and talent management. My goal is to successfully match top candidates to roles and provide consultation to both clients and candidates to ensure best practice and fit for both parties.

general.headline: Regional Manager QLD / NSW | Digital Engineering Corporation
general.description:
Born into an Entrepreneurial family Charlotte always had an interest for business and IT seeing her Dad establish a number of businesses throughout his career in the IT sector.

Due to this most of her studies right throughout high school were focussed around business and international politics. 

Therefore after completing her studies it made sense to join the family business (DEC), so she could continue to learn more about IT and business development in order to progress her career.

Starting in 2009, as the business grew so did Charlotte progressing from the Client Relationship Executive to the State Sales Manager in QLD and NSW in just a few small years.

During this time Charlotte has been fortunate enough to work with brands such as Shell, Monash University and Australia Post helping them not only maintain their IT systems, but decrease costs whilst increasing their security across their organisations, a key component of DEC’s mission.

With a passion for people and business, Charlotte revels in helping her clients not only get the best outcome for their specific needs, but also ensures they have only the best quality experience with the company, always going above and beyond what is expected in the industry. 

Charlotte prides herself on building long term business relationships by getting to know each and every person she does business with to establish fit and provide the best possible solution moving forward. 

To open up the conversation around whether or not DEC can help reduce your IT spend, derisk your systems and maintain your systems send her a private message on LinkedIn or visit: https://www.dec-aus.com/

jobs.description:
Digital Engineering Corporation (DEC) was founded in 2000 by Mark and Michele Walker with the mission to bring transparency to the IT industry and provide corporate Australia a better solution to decrease their spend, improve security and gain a much better ROI from their IT infrastructure.

Over the past 18 years DEC has worked with hundreds of clients nationwide, saving them over $100 million to date. Clients include Shell, Australia Post, Bluescope Steel and many other brands.

The team prides itself on being highly responsive to ensure all its customers get the support and advice when and where they need it from an onshore company.

As State Sales Manager QLD and NSW Charlotte focuses on working closely with some of DEC’s major long serving clients ensuring they only deal with an onshore person to handle all of their IT service needs.

general.headline: Digital Headhunter - IT Software | Australia | 2dSearch - Headhunting Australia's best IT candidates
general.school: West Coast Institute - Academy of Digital Technologies
general.description:
I am a former software engineer, whose code cutting days are behind me.

These days I am a digital headhunter, finding developers (etc.) for customers of the recruitment search firm 2dSearch. I am based in Perth but I recruit for positions across all of Australia and New Zealand. 

We do exactly as it says on the can. We use 2 degrees of networks (well, sometimes 3 degrees), to Search for people with the skills that our customers are looking for.

If I contact you, it means that I have a customer looking for someone with your skills. I am not interested in wasting time, the position I contact you about will be real, and one of our team can talk to you about it.

I work alongside Sofia Lavery (Melbourne), Andi Cole (Sydney) and Deb Harte (Somewhere up North), and between us we aim to be able to contact every software engineer in Australia (who has a LinkedIn profile).  We are also pretty accurate with our approach, and provided your profile is up to date, if we contact you then there is a good chance that you could do the job, it just comes down to location, money and desire...

I bring complex algorithmic based search capability to 2dSearch, and also like to think that I understand the software vacancies that we are asked to fill better than many IT recruiters.

I am however not a sales person, and prefer to liaise via email/messaging. If you would like to talk about the positions that we are recruiting for, then please feel free to call the Relationship Manager that I refer to in my approach, or call the Manager of 2dSearch Phil Redding on +61 9976 2272.

jobs.description:
2dSearch is an Australian based recruitment company, providing high quality recruitment services to IT Management customers in Australia. Previously I recruited in software development but following a restructure now recruit in the broader area of IT Software.  

As part of Endor Group, 2dSearch benefit from close relationships that Endor have developed with IT Management communities, that come together regularly in networking events. These networks have an online presence on LinkedIn and can be found via these links:

Sydney IT Management – Management level IT professionals in Sydney: http://www.linkedin.com/groupRegistration?gid=98968

Brisbane IT Management – Management level IT professionals in Brisbane: http://www.linkedin.com/groupRegistration?gid=138526

Melbourne IT Management – Management level IT professionals in Melbourne: http://www.linkedin.com/groupRegistration?gid=138525

Our primary method for finding applicants to our customers vacancies is by gaining referrals from these IT Management communities to people who they recommend. These candidates are referred to as our 2nd degree connections, hence our company name 2dSearch.

The founder of 2dSearch is Phil Redding, and his LinkedIn profile can be found here: http://au.linkedin.com/in/philredding

The Department of Education support almost 800 schools across WA, including some in the most remote parts of the world.

The remoteness factor causes challenges to our corporate mission:

"For every child to be provided with a high quality public school education – whatever their ability, wherever they live, whatever their background."

My role played a small part in this mission, developing software and software interfaces with vendors to allow systems integration, and assist in enabling the provision of high quality education.

Promoted from junior role in 2006.

general.headline: Solving scalability problems in ICT & Business Transformation
general.description:
I have travelled the world visiting over 50 countries and worked for 2 of the largest specialist recruitment agencies in Australia & England. I setup Jackson Talent Management (JTM) in 2015 to provide a highly customer centric offering that will now further disrupt how recruitment is done in Brisbane through our new Talent Management Outsourcing (TMO) offering. Passionate about Lean & Agile working and I always try to achieve the following

•	Integrate work and life to the point it is seamless and you are passionate about all of it
•	Help everyone you can, network, assist, advise, introduce & help people in Brisbane community.
•       If I can’t help you I will try and find someone that can
•	Integrity, honesty & openness – Be a real person not a soulless money making robot
•	Partnerships & long-term relationships are more important to me than transactional approaches 
•	Always try to listen, learn, discuss and continuously improve
•       I love Agility, Agile & Lean working. There will be mistakes on the way but its all about the  striving for excellence & enjoying life

I’m also a former volunteer Director with PMIQ running monthly Events, a Director with Exent Co providing Lean, Business Process Transformation & Better Business Change but the heart of what I love is being a specialist recruiter, a leader in my recruitment field across ICT & Business Transformation having successfully placed over 500 people in Brisbane. I love what I do but I integrate it with living life including hiking, travelling, skiing and sport.  Get me talking on these topics after a few coffees and I won’t stop. Contact me via Luke@jacksontm.com.au or call 0438 225 794

jobs.description:

I will continue to lead JTM's drive to Improve Customer Experience for candidates & provide clients with access to the the top performers in a scalable & instant model. JTM delivers targeted Consulting & Recruitment across ICT & Business Transformation and has successfully placed over 500 people in this vertical in Brisbane. JTM is on QLD Govt SOA PTD0033-15 as a specialist providing BA, PM & CM contingent labour. We don't use SEEK its all about being imbedded in the industry & working with the best. We specialise in;

My Engineering background coupled with my experience in HR and ICT has enabled me to see the bigger picture. My style of work with clients is to gain holistic knowledge of the business and offer professionals who can add value to their organisation. UI Masking: DHS requires a foundation capability consistently across service delivery brands but in particular within Centrelink and Child Support that will enable restrictions to be placed on staff access to customer records. This capability may be further extended in future releases to manage restrictions placed on customers with regard to service options, known as Restricted Servicing Arrangements.
Restricted Access (RA) is designed to take care of sensitive customer data records, i.e. in case of family violence or cases from DHS employee. A designated team shall verify requests and “hide” (mask) data from other DHS employees. Once a higher RA level is assigned to a customer, DHS employee without special authorizations (RA level less than that of the customer) would see masked data in attributes of the customer records.

general.headline: Recruitment Consultant at Aurec

jobs.description:
Melbourne, Australia
The Aurec Group provides specialised ICT Consulting & Professional Services to the Australian and Asia Pacific market. Since 2002, we have assisted our clients in translating business objectives into tangible ICT solutions. Our team of experts can extend your capability and drive efficiency from individuals through to enterprise scale business transformation. 

Servicing the market through two arms; Aurec (Staffing Solutions) or Chalfont Consulting (Managed & Professional Services), we can provide comprehensive services across a range of functions including Advisory, Management, Architecture, Analysis, Engineering, Administration, Development, Testing and Support. 

Drawing on over twelve years of experience, with clients ranging from Government, Defence, Consultancies, Blue Chip Organisations and SMEs, we are market experts within Australia and Asia Pacific providing global reach through our Migration Services Team. 

The Aurec Group have branches in Canberra, Sydney, Melbourne and Singapore.

general.headline: Vice President - Infrastructure Solutions Group (Asia Pacific) at Dell EMC
general.description:
With 20 years experience in the IT industry, Chris Kelly has had the opportunity to build & lead high performance teams in the fields of IT Consulting, Sales, Product Management, Operations and Marketing.   Chris has been working extensively across the Asia Pacific region and has now re-joined Dell as an Executive Director within the Commercial Sales & Enterprise Solutions business.   

Chris is attuned to the challenges and opportunities that "Cloud" and Digital Transformation represent to large enterprises, service providers and vendors.  He has worked closely with C level executives across some of Asia's largest organisations to understand the requirements of the customer and is well positioned to help organisations navigate this disruptive environment.

Prior to re-joining Dell, Chris was most recently the COO of CloudFX, an Asian based IT Consultancy firm focused on large scale IT Transformation & Cloud Enablement Services throughout the region with a particular emphasis on both the Telco/Service Provider and Banking/FSI segments.  

Chris also spent a number of years working for Lenovo as Director & General Manager where he led the ANZ Channel Sales Organisation as well as running the Product & Marketing business units.    Chris also served as Director for Lenovo’s Enterprise Product Group across Asia Pacific & Japan whilst being based out of Singapore from 2007 to 2009.

Chris’ broad experience base also includes having spent a number of years in various sales and product leadership roles for Dell across Asia Pacific & Japan between 1999 and 2007.

Specialties: Highly capable strategic thinker with a passion for building new businesses & driving accelerated growth.

jobs.description: Grid-Tools are specialists in data creation (or data generation), data masking and test data management. Our experienced personnel have been writing and developing solutions for large companies in both the private and public sectors for nearly 30 years. The Grid-Tools Datamaker™ suite includes a wide range of solutions for test data management with the primary focus on three key methods: Database Subsetting: creating secure, cut-down versions of production databases for testing and development - saving disk space and creating more efficient test environments. Data Masking: (or data obfuscation) de-identifying sensitive data records so they remain compliant to industry standards like HIPAA, the PCI DSS or the DPA. Data Generation or Data Creation: creating synthetic test data that models the data from production environments - offering the best code coverage techniques. All methods and techniques always maintain the referential and business integrity of the original environment.

general.headline: Business Leadership | Sales Management | Talent Development
general.description:
When I embarked on my journey with Nutanix 2 years ago, I could never have projected the professional and personal growth I had just elected to undergo.  Nutanix has been the most challenging, rewarding and empowering experience for which I will forever be grateful.  Even more exciting is the fact the journey has just begun. The groundwork has been laid for the next chapter with Nutanix as validated by the recent Gartner Magic Quadrant for HCI, our Q2 FY18 earnings report, and our guidance from business and technical perspectives, which provide quantifiable customer and partner benefits. 

Entering 2018, I am humbled by the reflection my IT career began 21 years ago in Austin, Texas.  I often wonder today what advice I would give that young Inside Sales Rep working from the infamous Round Rock campus when Compaq was the king of servers and Apple was struggling to stay alive.  One important note is many of the colleagues whom I shared those experiences with in the late ‘90s are still close friends today. 

For 16 years I have been based in Sydney but through my experiences with Dell, EMC and Nutanix I have built and maintained a substantial network of partners and colleagues across the Asia Pacific theatre. I have leveraged this network extensively in Australia, China, Hong Kong, Japan and Singapore as my APJ Inside Sales Team approaches 8x growth in headcount from our start in February 2016. The incremental value of revenue and demand generation delivered to our partners and Nutanix is only limited by how quickly we can hire. 

If you are ready to begin the next chapter of your IT career, please feel free to contact me with any questions.  My team members both past and present will tell you I put my team first and make a personal investment to ensure their professional growth.

Providing hyper-converged and rackscale solutions using EMC ScaleIO to large corporate and service provider customers. ScaleIO is elastic and delivers linear scale and performance from a few to thousands of servers.

Designing cloud-scale storage solutions using Elastic Cloud Storage (ECS) delivering a number of multi petabyte object platforms for Long Term Backup Retention, archiving and compliance, Internet of Things, global content repositories and distributed application centric storage use cases

jobs.description:
VCE (Now Converged Platforms Solution Division @ Dell EMC) is a joint venture between EMC and Cisco, with investments from VMware and Intel. 

At VCE we bought together best of breed technology in a fully converged infrastructure (Vblock) that is factory built, and then integrated into a customer environment, ready to accept production workloads in about 50 days. This not only reduces risk and management costs but allows IT departments to focus on initiatives that will add business value instead of just keeping the lights on.

My role was to work with VCE’s largest Service Providers (CSC & Telstra) and provide technical assistance to the whole team to bring in new business. This requires working closely with customers, partner and investor companies to provide the best solution for customer’s business requirements.

jobs.description:
Life’s too short for bad software. 

New Relic gives you deep performance analytics for every part of your Digital Platform. You can easily view and analyse massive amounts of data and gain actionable insights in real-time. For your apps. For your users. For your business.

The promise of Digital Transformation is clear but the challenges are real as Companies are scrambling to respond to higher consumer expectations and more nimble competitors. 
Whether you win or lose in the marketplace will be determined by your ability to move fast.
As you focus on moving faster, the question becomes: How do you accelerate when you don’t know what’s around the next corner? 

At New Relic, we help organisations move fast with confidence and we believe there are 3 fundamental requirements to operate at high speed and scale with confidence and clarity…
•	Observability - you need to be able to see everything with instrumentation across all of your technology stack so you can find and fix problems faster.
•	Adaptability - you need to be able to understand every change and get fast feedback. 
•	Alignment - work as a team, take the right action.

Put New Relic to work today and we will operate at high speed and scale resulting in deliverable measurable business benefits…
•	Service Reliability - Reduce outages, improve app quality, and service level optimization.
•	Accelerate Cloud Adoption - Build for scale while reducing application risk and accelerating the benefits from your strategic cloud investments.
•	DevOps Transformation - Measure your DevOps transformation to get teams delivering better quality software faster together
•	Digital Customer Experience - Align with the business and adapt quickly through enhanced usability, increased conversation rates and greater customer value and better experiences.

If you facing one or more of these challenges and see merit in connecting, please send me an inMail or call me on 0405 674 388. Let’s build beautiful Software together!!
